attributes.action: ensure school assembly each morning has hymns and the lords prayer said every morning - not just in c of e schools but in all GB schools.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Compulsory morning assembly in all our schools - with hymns and the Lords Prayer to be held every morning before commencing the day - (not just in c of e schools etc)as it was in the late 60's & 70's - scrapping them was the worst thing to do - no other country in the world would have done this. G.B. is and has always been a Christian country.
